posts.post_content:
I have this BVG 4.5 Series 3 Burke and Series 2 Loos, Danville for trade. Looking to trade them for Ft Worth players I need. For full disclosure the BVG Burke has paper loss on the back. 

These are the Ft Worth players I need. Looking to buy/trade for lower end cards. Creases, paper loss, trimming, and hole punches are all OK with me.:)
Burke
Coyle
Francis
Jollley
McKay
Pendelton
Weeks
Still looking for some Ft Worth players to add to my collection.
